channel.title: Help Please!
channel.description: Hello I Need Help With SomeThings If You Know The Anwer Please Replay How To Make An UpTime In The Quest Tab That Shows How Many Minutes The Server Was up Need A ::PLAYERS command mine only show how many players are on i want it to show the players names to How To Make When New Players Join There Quests Are All Done And Completed How To Make A Multi Portal How To Show The Hp IN The Client The Little Hp Orb How Do i Add it Please Replay :)

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @mostwanted8 mostwanted8
item.description:
@mostwanted8 wrote:

I Cant Use That Please Some 1 replay,

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @_kush †kush†
item.description:
@_kush wrote:

if(cmd[0].startsWith("players")){ int number = 0; for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++) { player.getActionSender().sendString("",275,i); } for(Player p5 : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) { if(p5 == null) continue; number++; String titles = ""; if (p5.getRights() == 0) { titles = "<shad=000000>"; } if (p5.getRights() == 1) { titles = "[Moderator]<img=0><shad=ff0000>"; } if (p5.getRights() == 2) { titles = "<shad=ff9900>[Admin]<img=1><shad=cc0ff>"; } if (p5.getRights() == 3) { titles = "[Co-Owner]<img=1><shad=98938>"; } if (p5.getRights() == 4) { titles = "[Owner]<img=1><shad=cc00ff>"; } player.getActionSender().sendString("("+p5.getIndex()+")" + titles + ""+ Misc.optimizeText(p5.getPlayerDetails().getUsername()) + " Combat: " + p5.getSkills().getCombatLevel(), 275, (16+number)); } player.getActionSender().sendString("<u=000080>Get GameHelp</u>",275,14); player.getActionSender().sendString("Players Online ATM!: "+number, 275, 16); player.getActionSender().sendString("Player's Currently Online", 275, 2); player.forceChat("<col=ffffff>There are currently [ <col=00ffff>"+number+" <col=ffffff> ] playing (your server name here)"); player.getActionSender().sendInterface(275, false); } }

Would that be better?

EDIT: You may have to add/delete to the command, but I figured that should be a good enough layout atleast…? I got that from my 562 loading 602 so please don’t flame x.x, I’ve never done a 317 let alone do I plan on it… but I try to help the best I can ^^.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Maikie61 Maikie61
item.description:
@Maikie61 wrote:

[quote=“ii bandos ii, post:4, topic:384844”] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!"); }

add that in to client.java sound’s like a delta[/quote]

Are you stupid? He said he didn’t want it like this. HE ALREADY HAS IT.
he wants to show WHO’s online not HOW MANY.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @_kush †kush†
item.description:
@_kush wrote:

Lol, what DEOB are you using? 508? 562? 602? Etc. ;o. I can help with the players command and the Quest Uptime might be a bit hard but I can try too help with that.

The quest finish thing, if there’s quest, then you should add a command for admins ::finishquests, or something like that, and add it for players if you want, that shouldn’t be so hard too add either :9.

Read full topic
